variables.label: Econumo One version
variables.description: Tag of Econumo One image on https://github.com/econumo/econumo-one/pkgs/container/econumo-one

variables.label: App Secret
variables.description: App Secret is a unique key used for security-related purposes.

variables.label: System API key
variables.description: System API key is required to enable API for loading currencies and currency rates https://econumo.com/docs/open-source/multi-currency/

instructions.start:
Econumo One (eh-KOH-noo-mo) is an open-source application for managing personal finances, supporting multiple currencies, and budgets.

For more information and available options, see https://econumo.com
instructions.end: Econumo One has been successfully deployed and it is available at http://$$cap_appname.$$cap_root_domain

description: Econumo One (eh-KOH-noo-mo) is an open-source application for managing personal finances, supporting multiple currencies, and budgets.
